name: Scientrace
body:
# Welcome to Scientrace on GitHub

![Scientrace 3D export of a solar cell with reflecting grid fingers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JoepBC/scientrace/gh-pages/images/scientrace_3d_export_gridfingers.png)

### Debian dpkg installer
The latest .deb installer can be downloaded from the [scientrace/dist](https://github.com/JoepBC/scientrace/tree/master/dist) folder. Besides the Scientrace binaries and code it contains some examples (/usr/lib/scientrace/example_simulations).

### Author
[Scientrace](http://www.scientrace.org/) has been developed by Joep Bos-Coenraad (@JoepBC) at the Applied Materials Science department of the [Radboud University](http://www.ru.nl/ams).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
